title: Russian crypto exchange Garantex seized by law enforcement operation
description: An international coalition of law enforcement agencies seized the official website of Garantex, which has previously been sanctioned by the U.S. and E.U. governments.© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Bitcoin as a US strategic reserve: Does it make sense?
description: Donald Trump hosts a cryptocurrency summit at the White House on Friday amid much anticipation about his plans for a national stockpile of digital currencies. Buying bitcoin at all-time highs could be a costly move.

title: How the Crypto Exchange Bybit Lost $1.5 Billion to North Korean Hackers
description: The cryptocurrency exchange Bybit lost $1.5 billion to North Korean hackers last month — and it all traced back to an account on a free digital storage service.
